Missing Points & Partner Rewards

If you provided your Best Western Rewards® card or membership number at the time of your Best Western stay please allow at least 7 days for points or airline miles to be posted to your account prior to submitting a Missing Points/Partner Rewards request.

If more than 7 days have passed since your departure date and points or airline miles are not posted to your account, please fill out the Missing Points/Partner Rewards request below and you will get assistance in getting credit for that stay. Please note: Stays over 6 months old can not be reviewed for points or miles.

Best Western only has information on file for reservations made through www.bestwestern.comor one of our worldwide reservations numbers. To get credit for those stays, complete the form below.

If your hotel stay was made in another manner, please mail or fax a copy of this completed form (including your membership number) and a copy of your itemized hotel receipt to:

Best Western Rewards
Points Desk
P.O. Box 42007
Phoenix, AZ 85080-2007
Fax: 623-780-6988

Residents of the U.S., Canada and the Caribbean can contact Best Western Rewards® Customer Service at 800-237-8483. If you reside outside of the U.S., Canada or the Caribbean, please contact one of the global offices.

Please be advised all messages that contain a URL in a field not requiring a URL will be discarded and not delivered.

Hello, Catherine!

Missing Points

Please fill out the Missing Points/Partner Rewards request below and you will get assistance in getting credit for that stay. Please note: Stays over 6 months old can not be reviewed for points or miles

More About Missing Points

Hotel Information - Stay 1
Hotel Information - Stay 2
Hotel Information - Stay 3

Best Western Rewards® Points or Airline Miles are issued by Best Western hotels when your Best Western Rewards® membership card is presented at check-in. Please present your card to the front desk personnel upon check-in for future credit. We appreciate your participation in Best Western Rewards®.

All rates qualify for Best Western Rewards® points, except the following: Aeroplan FI Rate Plan (92), Global F.I.T.C117 (FI), Dynamic Net Tour Rate (X2), VIP Dynamic Net Rate Plan (Global F.I.T.) (Z9) Online Travel Agents Merchant Rate Program (X2 / D2), Travelocity Promotions (D3 / TH), Orbitz Promotions (44 / 45), Priceline Promotions (1P / 2P), Priceline (PL / PN / D2), Hotwire (PL / D2), Employee Rate (EP), Free Night Program (FX), Unit Card (UC), and other locally negotiated hotel discount rates for crew and deeply discounted extended stays (greater than 20 percent discount).
